heading: About Me
credibility: I specialize in helping teams align around shared goals — across cultures, functions, and backgrounds. For the past 11 years in Japan, I've supported leaders, managers, and early-career talent in building:
approach: My approach blends structured leadership practices with a human-centered mindset. I listen deeply, turn insights into action, and help teams build habits that last — not just workshops that feel good once.
mission: When people feel understood and aligned, they perform better — and they stay longer.
